channel.title: Dong Xing's Blog
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Dong Xing's Blog

item.title: Garden
item.description: 一花一世界，一葉一菩提。 Aug. 25th, 2025 · New York, NY Aug. 26th, 2025 · Cambridge, MA Sept. 6th, 2025 · Princeton, NJ Sept. 8th, 2025 · Princeton, NJ Sept.

item.title: Dijkstra's Algorithm
item.description: Dijkstra’s Algorithm is an algorithm that computes the length of the shortest path from a vertex s to every vertex in a graph G=\langle V,E\rangle with non-negative edge weights in \mathcal{O}(|V|^2+|E|) time and \mathcal{O}(|V|) space, or \mathcal{O}((|V|+|E|)\log(|V|)) time and \mathcal{O}(|V|) sp...

item.title: Floyd-Warshall Algorithm
item.description: The Floyd-Warshall Algorithm is an algorithm that computes the length of the shortest path between every pair of vertices in a graph G=\langle V,E\rangle with edge weights in \mathcal{O}(|V|^3+|E|) time and \mathcal{O}(|V|^2) space.

item.title: Segment Tree
item.description: A Segment Tree maintains an array of n=2^k numbers a_0,a_1,\dots,a_{n-1} by maintaining s(0,2^k),s(0,2^{k-1}),s(2^{k-1},2^k),\dots,s(0,1),s(1,2),\dots,s(2^k-1,2^k), where s(l,r)=\sum_{i=l}^{r-1}a_i which costs a space of \mathcal{O}(n).

item.title: Sparse Table
item.description: A Sparse Table maintains an array of n numbers a_0,a_1,\dots,a_{n-1} by maintaining f(i,j)=\max_{k=j}^{j+2^i-1}a_k which costs a space of \mathcal{O}(n\log(n)).

item.title: Trie
item.description: A Trie maintains a set S of strings in \Sigma^* by maintaining a deterministic finite automaton that accepts and only accepts strings in S.

item.title: Competitive Programming Journey
item.description: Codeforces AtCoder MIT Informatics Tournament 2025-26 Winter Contest Dec.

item.title: Knuth-Morris-Pratt Algorithm
item.description: The Knuth-Morris-Pratt Algorithm is an algorithm that computes \pi(1),\pi(2),\dots,\pi(n) for a string s of length n in \mathcal{O}(n) time and \mathcal{O}(n) space, where \pi(i)=\max\{j:j<i\land s_0s_1\dots s_{j-1}=s_{i-j}s_{i-j+1}\dots s_{i-1}\} Algorithm 0 Applying the definition yields an alg...

item.title: Manacher's Algorithm
item.description: Manacher’s Algorithm is an algorithm that computes d(0),d(1),\dots,d(n-1) for a string s of length n in \mathcal{O}(n) time and \mathcal{O}(n) space, where d(i)=\max\{j:i-j\ge0\land i+j<n\land s_is_{i-1}\dots s_{i-j}=s_is_{i+1}\dots s_{i+j}\} Algorithm 0 Applying the definition yields an algorith...

item.title: Z Algorithm
item.description: The Z Algorithm is an algorithm that computes z(0),z(1),\dots,z(n-1) for a string s of length n in \mathcal{O}(n) time and \mathcal{O}(n) space, where z(i)=\operatorname{lcp}(s,s_is_{i+1}\dots s_{n-1}) Algorithm 0 Applying the definition yields an algorithm that solves the problem in \mathcal{O}(n^2...
